text:
@clairecmc If God always protects Christians (e.g. from Coronavirus), why do they need AR-15's to purchase Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Mac and Cheese at the Walmarts?

If you are too afraid to leave the house, to buy Spaghettios, without an assualt rifle , just stay home.
